original_text: And the flesh of the sacrifice of his peace offerings for thanksgiving shall be eaten on the day of his offering. He shall not leave any of it until the morning.
korean_text: 감사함으로 드리는 화목제물의 고기는 드리는 그 날에 먹을 것이요 조금이라도 이튿날 아침까지 두지 말 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And the flesh of the sacrifice
of his peace offerings for thanksgiving
shall be eaten on the day of his offering.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 드리는 날에 먹어야 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: He shall not leave any of it until the morning.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것을 아침까지 남겨두어서는 안 된다
